itemDescription: British javelin thrower and shot putter

wikipedia_page.main: Susan Mary Platt (born 4 October 1940) is a British former track and field athlete who competed for England and Great Britain in the javelin throw. She was a three-time Olympian and competed three times at the British Empire and Commonwealth Games. She had a personal best of 55.60 m (182 ft 4+3⁄4 in) and was Commonwealth champion in 1962.
